requirements: Application for Admission to B.E/B.Tech Degree Course
Uploading of required certificates and documents
Declaration by the applicant and parent/guardian
User-friendly interface for easy submission of application
Secure online platform for uploading sensitive documents
Fast and efficient processing of applications
Applicant must be a citizen of India
Applicant must have qualified the TN-HSC or equivalent
Applicant must have a valid Aadhar number (optional)
Applicant must have a valid community certificate (if applicable)
Must have studied VIII to XII in Tamil Nadu (if applicable)
Must have studied VI to VIII in private school under RTE and IX to XII in Government School (if applicable)
Must have a valid income certificate (if applicable)
Must have a valid differently abled certificate (if applicable)
Must have a valid special reservation form for sports and ex-serviceman (if applicable)
Applicant has a valid email address and mobile number for communication
Applicant has access to a computer and internet connection for online application submission
Applicant has all required documents and certificates ready for upload
